mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order (uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_province, recv_city, recv_area, recv_address, total_price, status, order_time, pay_time, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvProvince}, #{recvCity}, #{recvArea}, #{recvAddress}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})

INSERT INTO t_order_item (oid, pid, title, image, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{oid}, #{pid}, #{title}, #{image}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
